select id, name, password, phone, salt, app_id, channel_id, creation_date, last_login_date, last_update_date, online, profile_type, available, last_pc_id, last_sdat_id, last_sdnf_id, last_sdnw_id, last_cl_id, last_pce_id, last_bbs_id, device_type from profile where id = #{profileId}

SELECT m.parent_id as parentId, p.phone as cellPhone, p.name as parentName, concat(approved, '') as auditStatus FROM parent_student_map m INNER JOIN student s ON m.student_id = s.id INNER JOIN class c ON s.class_id = c.id INNER JOIN profile p ON p.id = m.parent_id and profile_type != 1 WHERE c.head_teacher_id = #{id} order by m.approved asc
SELECT parent_id, student_id,relationship,approved,approved_date,creation_date, last_update_date from parent_student_map where parent_id=#{parentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile_like_map (profile_id, news_id, creation_date) VALUES (#{profileId}, #{newsId}, #{now})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM profile_like_map WHERE profile_id = #{profileId} AND news_id = #{newsId}
mapper.select: SELECT profile_id as profileId, news_id as newsId, creation_date as creationDate FROM profile_like_map WHERE profile_id = #{profileId} AND news_id = #{newsId} LIMIT 1
mapper.update:
